newsitem.title: USA: NOTICE OF SALE - Miibrae SD, Calif., $5 mln TRANs.
newsitem.headline: NOTICE OF SALE - Miibrae SD, Calif., $5 mln TRANs.

text.p: NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN that sealed or facsimile bids will be received by The Stiepel Group, Inc., the Financial Advisor, acting on behalf of the Millbrae School District, County of San Mateo, State of California (the "District"), for the purchase of $5,000,000* principal amount of Millbrae School District, County of San Mateo, California 1997 Tax and Revenue Anticipation Notes at the hour of 10:30 A.M., Pacific Daylight Time, on
at the office of The Stiepel Group, Inc., 22761 Pacific Coast Highway, Suite 1025, Malibu, California 90265,

facsimile no. (310) 456-9340. In the event that no bid is awarded, the County and the District will receive bids the next business day and each business day thereafter at the same time and location until such time as a bid is awarded or the County and the District determine to withdraw sale of the Notes. An Official Statement and an Official Notice of Sale relating to the Notes will be furnished upon request to the Financial Advisor at (310) 456-9335.
